mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a formal invitation to the wedding of Nannie Walker to Clarence M. Wood on June 18, 1919 at the Firsti Baptist Church in Lexington, Va. The envelope is addressed to Nannie E. Walker. The envelope is embossed under the flap with the name of the supplier: Stone, Roanoke, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Invitation to Wedding of Nannie Walker and Clarence M. Wood, June 18, 1919 (correspondence)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Invitation cards
Weddings
Wood, Nannie Elizabeth Walker
Wood, Clarence M. (Clarence Mosby), Sr.
